metadata.title: CVE-2017-7264 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the fz_subsample_pixmap function in fitz/pixmap.c in Artifex Software, Inc. MuPDF 1.10a allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-7264` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.9a+ds1-4
mupdf-tools - 1.9a+ds1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9a+ds1-4').
